availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Gaines (Shelby County, Kentucky, and Smithland, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, and Smithland, Kentucky, physician. Married Henrietta F. Beatty Gaines in Shelby County on January 18, 1843. Father of Julius A Gaines, Francis M Gaines, Sarah A Gaines, and Mary J Gaines. Graduated from Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1844. Resident of Shelby County in 1862. Relocated to Smithland in 1863. Practiced medicine in Livingston County, Kentucky; Edmonson County, Kentucky; Butler County, Kentucky; and Ohio County, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 35B
